humanum_full_description_en:
From " gold " to " vertical ", the original meaning is ancient weight unit. "Said Wen": "Eight baht. From the gold, the sound is down." Bamboo slips from the tomb of Qin at Sleeping Tiger Land "Eighteen Kinds of Laws of Qin-Sikong" Letter 130: "One fat, one or two vehicles (cars) between the attacks, with glue One or two, fat and two hammers."

" Hammer " can mean a weight, and it is also a " hammer ". Dunhuang verse "Bodhisattva Man": "Float on the water until the Yellow River is completely dry."

" Hammer " also means hammering and percussion. Song Liuguo "Hu Xuebei Su Zhaosao": "Commit yourself to the hammer, take care of this gold and perfect it."
humanum_short_description_en: From " gold " to " down ", the original meaning is ancient weight unit.
humanum_full_description:
從「金」，「垂」，本義為古重量單位。《說文》：「八銖也。从金，垂聲。」睡虎地秦墓竹簡《秦律十八種‧司空》簡130：「一脂、攻間車一兩（輛），用膠一兩、脂二錘。」

　　「錘」可表示秤砣，亦作「鎚」。敦煌曲子詞〈菩薩蠻〉：「水面上秤錘浮，直待黃河徹底枯。」

　　「錘」也表示錘打、敲擊。宋劉過〈湖學別蘇召叟〉：「委身入壚錘，顧此金百鍊。」
humanum_short_description: 從「金」，「垂」，本義為古重量單位。
